abstract.locale: A single row in a tree. It should be placed inside a treeitem element. Children of the treerow should be treecell elements. If child rows are necessary, they should be placed in a treechildren element inside the parent treeitem.
Строка дерева. Размещается внутри элемента treeitem. Дочерними элементами являются treecell.

description.locale: Contains a collection of treecell child elements.
